game.name: Whiskers, Wizards and Wands
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A cozy puzzle adventure game where players use their creativity to explore a whimsical world, solve puzzles, overcome obstacles, and of course…fight baddies!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy puzzle adventure game where players use their creativity to explore a whimsical world, solve puzzles, overcome obstacles, and of course…fight baddies!
